binding:binding.name: km200 Binding
binding:binding.description: The KM200 Binding is communicating with a Buderus Logamatic web KM200 / KM100 / KM50. It is possible to recive and send parameters like string or float values.
binding:binding.author: Markus Eckhardt

parameter.name: ip4_address
parameter.label: IP4 Address
parameter.description: IP4 Address of the KMXXX device

parameter.name: PrivKey
parameter.label: Private Key
parameter.description: Option 1:Private en-/decryption key built from MD5Salt, GatewayPassword and PrivatePassword

parameter.name: MD5Salt
parameter.label: MD5Salt
parameter.description: Option 2: MD5Salt for the building of the private key

parameter.name: GatewayPassword
parameter.label: Gateway Password
parameter.description: Option 2: GatewayPassword for the building of the private key (Sticker on the device without '-')

parameter.name: PrivatePassword
parameter.label: Private Password
parameter.description: Option 2: Private Password for the building of the private key (Set in the App)
